definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: The filing lists the Chinese state as co-defendant.
sentences.chinese: 起诉书中把中国政府列为共同被告。

sentences.english: The defendant was given a copy fo information before he was called upon to plead.
sentences.chinese: 被告在被传唤进行辩护之前收到一份警方起诉书副本。

sentences.english: The indictment charges that Chung was a willing participant.
sentences.chinese: 起诉书指控钟东凡是一名自愿的参与者。

sentences.english: He was subdued and restrained by the passengers and crew, it said, and taken into custody by federal agents once the plane landed.
sentences.chinese: 起诉书还说，他被乘客和机组人员制伏和控制。

sentences.english: According to the indictment sheet, Zhai is facing the serious charge of making a terroristic threat.
sentences.chinese: 在起诉书中，翟田田面临着“制造恐怖威胁”的指控。

sentences.english: If the indictments are confirmed by a judge, the court will issue arrest warrants.
sentences.chinese: 如果起诉书被法官确认，法院将发出逮捕令。

sentences.english: Read of the indictment to the accused and hearing his plea.
sentences.chinese: 向刑事案被告宣读起诉书并听取他的答辩。

sentences.english: The indictments by text messages are not intended to take people by surprise.
sentences.chinese: 以手机简讯传达起诉书目的并非让人大吃一惊。

sentences.english: Criminal indictments are only charges and not evidence of guilt.
sentences.chinese: 刑事起诉书只涉及指控，不涉及犯罪证据。

sentences.english: Until now, the indictment hasn't been served to the defendant from the Xinxiang Intermediate People's Court.
sentences.chinese: 至今新乡市中级人民法院尚未向被告人送达起诉书。

sentences.english: Prosecutor is to read a 73-page indictment.
sentences.chinese: 公诉人正在宣读一份长达73页的起诉书。

sentences.english: There were more than 50 victims, according to the indictment.
sentences.chinese: 起诉书中说，在这起事件中有50多位受害者。

sentences.english: The charges are now being translated into all the defendants' native languages and served.
sentences.chinese: 起诉书的内容被翻译成各被告的母语送交被告。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
to raise a charge/to sue/to institute proceedings
